description: In a special treat for our members, we bring you Playgirl centerfold Michael Crowe.Michael is no stranger to taking his clothes off, but he is an amateur when it comes to doing videos. He is definitely the guy next door. His charming good looks and warm personality make him a terrific addition to the Next Door Male family.Watch Michael in 4 scenes. He starts out in the living room as he gets undressed and spends a little bit of quality time with himself. Next, he relaxes in the kitchen after a hard workout at the gym. Next, he showers and we get to watch him lather himself up. And finally, the last scene is of him in bed as he works up to an intense climax that will leave you breathless. We hope you enjoy this one-of-a-kind stud as much as we did.
title: Michael
